articles.title: Association between hearing aid use and all-cause and cause-specific dementia: an analysis of the UK Biobank cohort - The Lancet
articles.description:
In people with hearing loss, hearing aid use is associated with a risk of dementia
of a similar level to that of people without hearing loss. With the postulation that
up to 8% of dementia cases could be prevented with proper hearing loss management,
our find…
